reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's pretty color and material quality, with one noting its great weight. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it great while others wish it was better, and the size runs large according to several reviews. The thickness and length also get mixed reactions, with some finding it perfect while others disagree.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What more could you want in a sweater?
items.body: This sweater is the best! I‚Äôve bought it in beige and turquoise and get nothing but compliments! It fits just right, is the perfect length, and looks classy. What more could you want in a sweater? Read more
items.author: Melanie C. Schaafsma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars such good quality
items.body: LOVE. Perfect thickness and material is soft and just feels expensive! Read more
items.author: Jordan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs large.
items.body: It runs big. I normally get an XL. This suggested that I got get a large size I should‚Äôve gotten a medium. It‚Äôs way long in the sleeves and the cuffs are too loose that it doesn‚Äôt stay at my wrist so I get that nice pretty sleeve poof. The quality is fine and it‚Äôs a pretty color. I just wish the fit was better that‚Äôs all. Read more
items.author: E. Swim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous and the fit was great. If you don't want the oversized look, definitely size down. Read more
items.author: B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater
items.body: Good material, good finish, right size, very satisfied with my purchase, worth the amount paid. After delivery I bought another one in black. Read more
items.author: Denise

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater. It is a great weight and drapes nicely. The only negative is that it picks easily. One time wear and it is snagged in multiple places. These were not from jewelry, just normal wear. Read more
items.author: THERESA ALFANO

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Returning this shirt
items.body: this is just not a flattering shirt. The orange color is more pumpkin than pumpkin spice and the material feels thin and cheep. It doesn't really qualify to fall in the sweater category. Read more
items.author: Lisa L

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Sweater
items.body: Just got this today. Great price for very nice quality sweater. Soft and not thick, cuffed at the sleeveüëç. I wanted a royal blue sweater. This is definitely a keeper. I normally order large but this I ordered a medium and it was perfect. Read more
items.author: Dave's

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Maroon, Burgundy, Apricot Khaki, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Dark Gray, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Red, Lake Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
